org.apache.hadoop.yarn.submarine.common.fs

Class DefaultRemoteDirectoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.submarine.common.fs.DefaultRemoteDirectoryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteDirectoryManager

    public class DefaultRemoteDirectoryManager
extends Object
implements RemoteDirectoryManager
    Manages remote directories for staging, log, etc. TODO, need to properly handle permission / name validation, etc.
